text: Ardit Deliu (born 26 October 1997, in Kavajë) is an Albanian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Albanian club Laçi and the Albania national under-21 football team. ==Club career== ===Early career=== Deliu started his youth career in 2011 at local club Besa Kavajë as a 14 years old.Ardit Deliu profile FSHF.org During the 2012–13 season he played for the under-17 side managed by Ylli Teliti forming a strong duo striker partnership with Regi Lushkja, where in the first half of the season the duo scored 90% off all Besa Under-17 goals.Deliu e Lushkja, e ardhmja e sigurt e Besës Sporti Shqiptar ===Besa Kavajë=== He gained entry with the first team in 2014 as he was included by the coach Artan Mërgjyshi to participate in an Albanian Cup match against Veleçiku Koplik on 22 October 2014 where he also made his debut by coming on as a substitute in the 46th minute in place of Darlien Bajaziti.Besa - Veleçiku - Ndeshje FSHF.orgBesa Kavajë vs. Veleçiku Koplik - 22 October 2014 Soccerway One month later Deliu made his league debut against Burreli on 22 November 2014 and also scored his first goal for Besa Kavajë.Burreli vs. Besa Kavajë - 22 November 2014 Soccerway He concluded the season with 4 league appearances in total scoring 2 goals and a single Domestic cup appearance. ===RNK Split=== On 27 August 2015 Deliu signed with Croatian side RNK Split following the recommendation of Sokol Cikalleshi, the fellow Albanian player of RNK Split during the 2014–15 season.Tjetër talent në Kroaci Sportal.al Being underage, he wasn't registered until February 2016. ===Hajduk Split=== On 7 February 2017 Deliu signed with HNK Hajduk Split II until June 2018.Marin Fadić i Ardit Deliu novi igrači Hajduka II HNK Hajduk Split ==International career== === Albania U17 === Deliu was part of the Albania national under-17 football team of coach Džemal Mustedanagić in the 2014 UEFA European Under-17 Championship, appearing in 5 out 6 matches between qualifying round and elite round, completing 3 full 80-minute matches in the qualifying round and two appearances as a substitute in the elite round. === Albania U19 === Deliu advanced at Albania national under-19 football team as he was invited by coach Arjan Bellai to participate in the 2016 UEFA European Under-19 Championship qualification from 12 to 17 November 2015.U-19, nis grumbullimi për eliminatoret FSHF.org He played two full 90-minutes matches against Austria U19 in a 1–2 loss and Georgia U19 in the 0–1 loss, where he received an yellow card yellow card for each match and missed the closing match.Ardit Deliu matches at Soccerway === Albania U21 === Deliu received a call up at Albania national under-21 football team by coach Alban Bushi for a gathering in Durrës, Albania from 18 to 25 January 2017.Alban Bushi: Ja emrat për grumbullimin e parë në Durrës FSHF.org He was invited again in the next gathering two months later for a double Friendly match against Moldova U21 on 25 & 27 March 2017. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Club statistics |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League
